overview: When you have someone in your life always ready to play, when and where you want, you can get cocky. It doesn't matter if he's top or bottom, or if he's a neighbor, co-worker, or boyfriend. Sooner or later, you're going to feel as if you own that person. You'll get possessive, like Alec Loob, Oliver Morgenson, Justin Cross, Xavier Ryan, Jack Finix, Lucian Fair, Chris Summers, and Zack Love. And like them, once you know your guy will drop everything the moment you call, text, or show up to fuck, you too will say he's Mine To Play With
title: Mine to Play With
